thread.title: Genia Meinhold
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Genia Meinhold

author: Genia Meinhold
title: Genia Meinhold
text:
I have used Costa Rican Vacations myself and recommended it to many friends. Comprehensive, excellent service. Especially love working with Robin Sabine. Her knowledge of the area is extensive and she really listens to your needs and wants and tailors the perfect vacation at the right cost.
The only thing missing was a sloth sightingðŸ˜Š
I highly recommend!
